citations.narrative:
Primary enclosures of several rabbits had a buildup of hair, urine, and rust on the edges of pans containing bedding
underneath the wire floors. Periodic cleaning to ensure that debris is kept from building up on waste pans assists in
preventing a buildup of potentially harmful bacteria and disease causing agents. The facility must ensure that appropriate
cleaning is performed at a minimum of weekly.

New rabbits delivered on June 14, 2023 were housed in cages that were not sanitized before placement of the new
residents in the cages. Sanitization of cages between animals may prevent the transmission of disease causing agents.
The facility must ensure the enclosures are sanitized prior to the introduction of new animals.
Correct from this date forward, June 15, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.56(a)(3) 
   
Sanitation. 
Primary enclosures of several rabbits had a buildup of hair, urine, and rust on the edges of pans containing bedding 
underneath the wire floors. Periodic cleaning to ensure that debris is kept from building up on waste pans assists in 
preventing a buildup of potentially harmful bacteria and disease causing agents. The facility must ensure that appropriate 
cleaning is performed at a minimum of weekly. 
3.56(b)(2) 
   
Sanitation. 
New rabbits delivered on June 14, 2023 were housed in cages that were not sanitized before placement of the new 
residents in the cages. Sanitization of cages between animals may prevent the transmission of disease causing agents. 
The facility must ensure the enclosures are sanitized prior to the introduction of new animals. 
 
Correct from this date forward, June 15, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
